.. title:: Yet Another Sudoku | Foundation

==========
Foundation
==========

A language (notation, grammar and terminology) to describe Sudoku Puzzles, patterns and their resolutions,
is explained, together with the underlying logic applied in the resolution of Sudoku patterns.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 5

   01-language
   02-concepts
   03-subsets
   04-base-cover-sets
   05-chains-loops-nets
   06-unlocked-sets
   07-uniqueness
   08-searching
